alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:55PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN IBERIA... LAFAYETTE...NORTHERN VERMILION...ST. MARTIN AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 1045 PM CST... At 955 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Leonville to near Indian Bayou to 10 miles south of Klondike. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Abbeville, Catahoula, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Carencro, St. Martinville, Kaplan, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Forked Island, Avery Island, Broussard, Youngsville, Sunset, Erath, Delcambre, and Duson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 94 and 126. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
